title: Alchemy Table
info: The Alchemy Table is a post-Skeletron crafting station used to craft potions. It works almost identically to Placed Bottles when crafting potions, except it has a chance of not consuming ingredients. It can be found randomly in the Dungeon, and in the  Desktop version and  Mobile version it can also be obtained by fishing in the Dungeon.
stat:
